Title: English Only, Please
Writer: Antoinette Jadaone (story), Dan Villegas (story), Antoinette Jadaone (screenplay), Anjeli Pessumal (screenplay)
Actors: Derek Ramsay, Jennylyn Mercado, Kean Cipriano, Cai Cortez
Plot: A Filipino-American man hires a translator to help translate a letter he wrote for the woman that broke his heart.
